pledges.title: Bamboo Stand
pledges.desc: You get an ergonomic stand made of natural bamboo. You've helped us launch our promotional campaign, and you’ll be added to a special Backer member list.

pledges.title: Black Edition Stand
pledges.desc: You get a Black Special Edition computer stand and a personal thank you. You’ll be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.

pledges.title: Mahogany Special Edition
pledges.desc: You get two Special Edition Mahogany stands, a Backer T-Shirt, and a personal thank you. You’ll be added to our Backer member list. Shipping is included.
